name: Daka Padamati
summary: Innovative Senior Full Stack Engineer with 15+ years of experience architecting high-performance, scalable systems using Node.js (NestJS, Express) and Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask). Proven track record of building cloud-native microservices, AI/ML-driven analytics, and automated CI/CD pipelines, delivering measurable improvements in performance, reliability, and operational efficiency. Adept at leading Agile teams, modernizing legacy systems, and designing dynamic frontend experiences with React, Next.js, Angular, and Vue. Combines deep backend expertise with product-focused engineering to drive business value, user engagement, and technological innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Designed and implemented Node.js (NestJS) microservices to handle over 3 million IoT telemetry events per day, creating an event-driven architecture with RabbitMQ and gRPC, reducing inter-service latency by 50% and increasing system throughput by 40%, while ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.

Integrated Python-based AI/ML pipelines (TensorFlow, scikit-learn, FastAPI) into Node services to detect sensor anomalies and predict maintenance needs, cutting false-positive alerts by 42%, and enabling proactive device monitoring that improved overall operational efficiency by 35%.

Migrated monolithic Node and Python services to AWS cloud-native microservices (ECS, Lambda, S3, RDS) using Terraform and CloudFormation, achieving 55% faster deployment cycles, automated infrastructure provisioning, and a more resilient architecture capable of scaling dynamically.

Built React + Next.js dashboards connected to Node.js and Python APIs for live IoT metrics visualization, enabling operations teams to identify anomalies in real-time, track KPIs, and make data-driven decisions with sub-200ms latency.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, automating builds, tests, and deployments, reducing manual deployment efforts by 70% while increasing deployment success rates to 95%, and improving cross-team collaboration.

Developed monitoring, logging, and predictive alerting with Prometheus, Grafana, and CloudWatch, achieving 99.98% uptime, establishing early-warning alerts, and enabling root-cause analysis for critical infrastructure incidents.

Led a cross-functional Agile team of 7 engineers, conducting sprint planning, architectural reviews, and mentorship sessions, improving team delivery velocity by 25%, enforcing coding standards, and ensuring knowledge transfer across backend, Python, and frontend stacks.

experience.title: Technical Lead
details: Architected a distributed logistics platform using Node.js (NestJS, Express) that processed millions of shipment events per day with high reliability and low latency, enabling real-time tracking for internal operations and external partners.

Integrated Python ML pipelines (Pandas, NumPy, TensorFlow) to implement predictive analytics for shipment route optimization, reducing late deliveries by 24% and lowering fuel and operational costs by 18% annually.

Developed Node.js microservices for asynchronous API integrations with external carriers, using REST and WebSocket protocols, enabling real-time ETA updates, dynamic notifications, and seamless cross-system communication.

Modernized legacy PHP and .NET components into modular Node.js microservices, containerized with Docker, orchestrated on AWS ECS, and automated with Terraform, improving maintainability, horizontal scalability, and deployment speed by 50%.

Built React and Angular frontends interfacing with Node APIs, providing real-time dashboards for shipment tracking, customer notifications, and operational KPIs, improving customer satisfaction by 30%.
Implemented automated testing frameworks using Jest, PyTest, and Postman, reducing QA cycles by 45% and ensuring stable multi-service releases across production and staging environments.
Optimized PostgreSQL and MongoDB queries, enhancing report generation speed and analytics API performance by 60%, enabling faster decision-making for logistics operations.

experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Developed backend services using Node.js and Python (Django, Flask) to support high-throughput internal analytics platforms, handling millions of user sessions while ensuring sub-second API response times and high concurrency.

Built AngularJS dashboards (2012+) for real-time visualization of system performance and operational metrics, enabling engineering and product teams to quickly detect bottlenecks and take corrective actions.
Integrated AI/ML workflows using Python (TensorFlow prototypes) into Node.js APIs for predictive analytics, automating internal reporting, user behavior tracking, and anomaly detection processes.
Automated ETL pipelines and data aggregation using Python scripts and Airflow DAGs, reducing manual intervention by 70% and improving reliability of internal analytics workflows.
Developed Node.js microservices for asynchronous event processing, improving modularity, reducing processing latency by 30%, and enhancing fault tolerance for critical internal services.
Conducted peer code reviews, refactoring, and test automation using Jest, PyTest, and Selenium, improving code maintainability, test coverage, and production reliability.

Actively participated in Agile sprint planning, architecture design reviews, and cross-team collaboration, contributing to scalable backend infrastructure design and long-term technical roadmap alignment.
